languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится, окидывая взглядом темные залы {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g}.{/n} "Ни торжественной церемонии, ни личной встречи с магосами... боюсь, мы опоздали, и будем иметь дело не со скрытыми еретиками".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится, окидывая взглядом темные залы {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g}.{/n} "Ни торжественной церемонии, ни личной встречи с магосами... боюсь, мы опоздали, и будем иметь дело не со скрытыми еретиками".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}'s dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with Magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится, окидывая взглядом темные залы {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g}.{/n} "Ни торжественной церемонии, ни личной встречи с магосами... боюсь, мы опоздали, и будем иметь дело не со скрытыми еретиками".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the manufactorum's dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the manufactorum's dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum's{/g} dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}'s dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with Magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希皱着眉头，目光扫过{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}阴暗的大厅。{/n}“这里既没有庄严的仪式，也没有与贤者的私人会面……我担心我们已经来得太晚，恐怕找不到那些行踪诡秘的异端分子了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}'s dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with Magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希皱着眉头，目光扫过{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}阴暗的大厅。{/n}“这里既没有庄严的仪式，也没有与贤者的私人会面……我担心我们已经来得太晚，恐怕找不到那些行踪诡秘的异端分子了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño mientras sus ojos examinan los pasillos oscuros del {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}.{/n} «Ni ceremonias solemnes ni encuentros en persona con los Magos... Me temo que llegamos demasiado tarde. Estos herejes han dejado atrás la clandestinidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}'s dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with Magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño mientras sus ojos examinan los pasillos oscuros del {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}.{/n} «Ni ceremonias solemnes ni encuentros en persona con los magos... Me temo que llegamos demasiado tarde. Esto ya no es obra de herejes clandestinos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}の暗いホールを見渡しながら顔をしかめた。{/n}「厳粛な儀式も、賢人による個別の出迎えもない…我々は遅すぎたようですね。結局、潜んでいる異端者を相手にすることはないでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}'s dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with Magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}の暗いホールを見渡しながら顔をしかめた。{/n}「厳粛な儀式も、賢人による個別の出迎えもない…我々は遅すぎたようですね。結局、潜んでいる異端者を相手にすることはないでしょう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix verzieht das Gesicht, als sein Blick über die dunklen Hallen des {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorumschweift{/g}.{/n} "Keine feierliche Zeremonie, kein persönliches Treffen mit Magi ... Ich fürchte, wir kommen zu spät und werden es doch nicht mit heimlichen Ketzern zu tun bekommen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}'s dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with Magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix verzieht das Gesicht, als sein Blick über die dunklen Hallen des {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorums{/g} schweift.{/n} "Keine feierliche Zeremonie, kein persönliches Treffen mit Magi ... Ich fürchte, wir kommen zu spät und werden es doch nicht mit heimlichen Ketzern zu tun bekommen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fronce les sourcils en balayant du regard l'intérieur obscur du {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}.{/n} « Pas de cérémonie solennelle, pas de magos pour nous accueillir... J'ai bien peur que nous arrivions trop tard et que nous ne trouvions aucun hérétique clandestin ici. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}'s dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with Magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fronce les sourcils en balayant du regard l'intérieur obscur du {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}.{/n} « Pas de cérémonie solennelle, pas de magos pour nous accueillir... J'ai bien peur que nous arrivions trop tard et que nous ne trouvions aucun hérétique clandestin ici. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorumun{/g} karanlık odalarını gözlerken yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Dinî tören yok, Magoslarla görüşme yok... Korkarım geç kaldık, gizemli kâfirlerle buluşamayacağız gibi."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix frowns as his eyes sweep over the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}'s dark halls.{/n} "No solemn ceremony, no personal meeting with Magi... I fear we are too late and we won't be dealing with clandestine heretics after all."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorum{/g}un karanlık odalarını gözlerken yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} “Dinî tören yok, Magoslarla görüşme yok... Korkarım geç kaldık, gizemli kâfirlerle buluşamayacağız gibi.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
